channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Strawberry swimmer circles Lake Tahoe as training for 840-mile California coast swim
item.description: Covering 60 miles in six days, Catherine Breed is believed to be the first to follow the full Lake Tahoe Water Trail.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon adds EV-readiness, stricter energy rules for more home projects
item.description: Tiburon will require EV-charging readiness and stricter energy-efficiency standards for more home projects starting in 2026.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon council OKs $600k grant toward addressing sea rise
item.description: Tiburon receives nearly $600K in state funds to create a sea-level rise vulnerability assessment and adaptation plan.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: New leadership drives Tiburon Fireâ€™s overhaul of strategic planning
item.description: Tiburon Fire will spend $49,875 on its first strategic plan in 15 years to guide operations and leadership changes.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Tiburon council advances updates for faster lot splits, duplex approvals
item.description: Tiburon updates housing rules to match new state law easing duplex, lot-split approvals in single-family neighborhoods.
item.dc:creator: Kevin Hessel

item.title: Everyday Encounter: A pair of teens gets to know each other over lunch at The Boardwalk
item.description: Teens Hunter Cristo and Liat Holden connect over lunch after a random Safeway encounter, sharing lacrosse dreams and life goals.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Pick of the Week: Tiburon Native American cultural festival Sunday
item.description: The inaugural Tiburon Native American Arts and Cultural Event runs from 1 to 4 p.m. Aug. 17 in Zelinsky Park.
item.dc:creator: The Ark

item.title: Tiburon artist laureate aims to bridge community, environment
item.description: Christa Grenawalt begins a four-year term as the town's newest cultural ambassador.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon officials back flood study for Greenwood Cove Drive
item.description: $200k proposal aims to ease chronic road problems tied to tides and runoff
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez
